full_text:
New CFA Level II exam question:

What’s the biggest determinant of market prices?

(a) interest rates

(b) valuations

(c) Reddit memes

(d) 7x leveraged family offices w/a history of insider trading

localize.full_text:

(b) 估值

(c) Reddit备忘录

(d) 7倍杠杆家族办公室，有内幕交易历史

決定市場價格的最大因素是什麼？

(b) 估值
